result.execSummary:
The defendant Robert Lee Hermann was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Robert Lee Hermann is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Robert Lee Hermann was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: *Pay all costs and surcharges by 10/31/16 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

defendant.name: Hermann, Robert Lee

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Robert Lee Hermann in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.

AS TO COUNT 1:  State's witness not present in court.  On motion of the State, Court ordered count dismissed.

AS TO COUNT 2:  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 4 DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for 4 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION. 

Court ordered defendant to pay ALL COSTS and SURCHARGES by 10-31-2016 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
FIiled, Notice of Motion and Motion To Suppress Evidence After Illegal Stop, Search and Arrest

Defendant Robert Lee Hermann in court with attorney Danielle L. Shelton.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a motion hearing date in Branch 24.  Court ordered defense motion to be filed by August 10, 2015.  Court ordered case adjourned for motion hearing in Branch 24.  Motion hearing scheduled for October 29, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Robert Lee Hermann in court.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Attorney Danielle Shelton did not appear.  Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 24.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.

Defendant Robert Lee Hermann in court.  Anthony E. White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case is adjourned for return on bench warrant in Branch 24, Judge Protasiewicz.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Cash bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 750.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Danielle L. Shelton in court.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
05/01/2015

Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
05/01/2015
Defendant is traveling out of state to visit with his ill parent. Court ordered pretrial to be set in Court's next pretrial cycle  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 06-18-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert Lee Hermann
Current: 9230 S. Chicago Road, Oak Creek, WI 53154   (Effective: 05-05-2015)
Prior: 9230 S. Chicago Road, Oak Creek, WI 53154
Cash bail that was previously posted to remain.  No driving without a valid license. No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription

Defendant Robert Lee Hermann in court.  Joanne L Hardtke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br.24.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 5/5/15 @ 1:30 pm
